data.title: The Singer’s Musical Theatre Anthology Song Guide + Recordings (Baritone/Bass Volumes)
data.meta_description: Hal Leonard’s The Singer’s Musical Theatre Anthology songbooks are great standard theatre repertoire resources for singers and teachers. The only problem is, there are a lot of songs to k…
data.text:
Hal Leonard’s The Singer’s Musical Theatre Anthology songbooks are great standard theatre repertoire resources for singers and teachers. The only problem is, there are a lot of songs to keep track of! To assist, I created this ‘interactive song guide’ for the seven Baritone/Bass volumes of The Singer’s Musical Theatre Anthology (+ the Teen’s Edition). I first organized all the songs by music style and then created corresponding Spotify playlists with audio recordings and tables that include additional song information. You can use the playlists and tables below to assist with finding the perfect theatre songs! My guides for the SMTA Soprano, Mezzo/Belter, and Tenor are available here.

P.S. Looking for more musical theatre song suggestions? Check out my professional repertoire guides here.

OPERETTA SONGS | c. 1870s-1920s

[Songs/arias from operettas and operas]
